name: Grimlock
senses: blindsight 30 ft. or 10 ft. while deafened (blind beyond this radius)

traits.Blind Senses: The grimlock can't use its blindsight while deafened and unable to smell.
traits.Keen Hearing and Smell: The grimlock has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or smell.
traits.Stone Camouflage: The grimlock has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

actions.Spiked Bone Club: Melee Weapon Attack: +5+1d4 + 3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) bludgeoning damage plus 2 (1d4) piercing damage.
